column1: starts on a full length, gets his natural away movement. Easily played into the off side, towards cover
a tad straighter, still full. Not much swing. Just a little bit of away seam movement, outside-edged down to third man
nice stroke. A tad short this time, short and wide. Scythed down to third man for a run. Played that late
good stuff. Full again, in a good channel just outside off, carved down to third man with an angled bat
straying down leg, rapped on the pad. Full delivery on Shafiq's pads, he fails to make contact. An optimistic appeal is quickly aborted
a bit of a whirry action. Full and straight to start, defended towards mid-off
strays down leg this time, wide.
on the pads again, Shehzad misses a flick. Off the pad towards square leg
too straight yet again, worked away through square leg for one
lovely line, but well played too. Full and straight, prodded away towards cover for a quick run
goes over mid-on this time. Again, full. Again, straight. Predictable. Shafiq goes up and over mid-on. Easy
looks to go over again, fails to time it. Full outside off. Shafiq mis-times his drive to mid-off
nice line, nagging away around off, blocked
good length around middle, jabbed to midwicket for a couple. But is he quick enough? Shafiq needed a full-length dive and that saved him. Kept the bat face pointing up. Good effort from Shafiq.

given! A bouncer down leg, Shehzad tries to get outside the line and help the ball down to fine leg. But can't get bat on his stroke, just glove. A simple catch for the keeper and Lahore strike! Beaten by some extra bounce
comes down to Tanvir and flamingo-flicks him through midwicket for a couple. Proactive stuff from KP. Lovely shot, great timing
big appeal. On the pads, KP misses a flick, the ball ricochets towards short fine leg. Pitched way outside leg
full and wide outside off, slapped away with bad timing to cover.
the carrom ball to start. Full outside off, KP looks to turn the ball through midwicket, but gets a leading edge to cover
short and wide this time, slashed to extra cover
a touch straighter and fuller, Pietersen nails his sweep to deep backward square leg
a slog sweep! Tossed up on off, Shafiq gets low and pounces all over his sweep. Just beats midwicket, the fielder at the boundary makes a mess of his dive
gives himself room this time, full and straight, hit away to mid-off. Bad timing
gets waaay outside off stump and misses his sweep. The bowling team inexplicably goes up in appeal. No run
nicely played. Full delivery outside off, hit up to mid-off with great timing. Doesn't find the gap

inside-edged into the stumps. A massive wicket. Pietersen runs at the bowler and wipes his bat through the line. There is a bit of inward seam movement though and the ball takes the inside edge and whacks leg stump. One of the Gladiators' best batsman.
good length outside off, pushed away towards cover from the crease
just struggling with timing are these batsmen. There is some natural movement too. Full on off and middle, swiped to midwicket
full outside off, comes down again and drives hard to mid-off
lovely change in pace. A slower delivery on middle, Shafiq is way too early through his pull and is hit on the body. Clever bowling
flat and wide, driven away towards point
drops short on off, Rossouw goes back and slaps his pull to mid-on. A naughty fumble allows one
falls just short of midwicket. Flat on off, Shafiq gets across, looks to hit over square leg but toe-ends it almost to deep midwicket
good length. Flat and straight, pushed back
a good single, push and run to cover
another nasty wipe across the line. Slow down leg, Shafiq gives himself room, Narine follows him. Beaten
shortish and wide, nailed to the deep sweeper cover fielder
runs down at the bowler. Good length on middle, Shafiq advances and mis-times a pull back to the bowler. Looking for muscle, not timing, not his strength
he'll get four this time. Not the greatest looking stroke. A slower bouncer outside off, Shafiq gets a top edge which flies in the gap at backward square leg
good length on off, hammered back to the bowler
no run there. What? Short and wide, pushed to short cover. Shafiq calls for one, puts his partner in jeopardy too. The fielder misses the stumps at the bowler's end. Out by a distance if he hit

bat goes over square leg. Waaaatch out! The third umpire is called for. The ball went somewhere towards midwicket. While everyone was looking at the bat, the batsmen complete two. The bat handle is in Rossouw's hand, the rest of his bat isn't. They have plenty of replacements these days. Rossouw's foot is inside the crease, plenty of replays.
that's better from Shafiq. Stick to his strengths. One of them is his touch. He gets low and reverse-paddles the ball down to the third man boundary. Fantastic
the hard sweep this time, earns him one to deep square leg
tossed up outside off, drilled down to long-off
flat outside off, Shafiq runs down and flicks to deep square leg. One
another nice paddle reverse sweep. Flat on off, played with soft hands to short third man
short and wide, crashed straight to cover
good length on off, looks to hit that to long-on. Mis-timed to long-off
poor delivery. Short and wide, cut in front of point for a couple. There is an overthrow too. Three the result
shortish and straight, Rossouw flat-bats the ball back to the bowler. Bad timing again
nice slower delivery, good length on off. Mis-timed away towards point
a slower delivery that goes wrong. Strays down leg, wide
there goes McCullum with an acrobatic dive. A low full toss outside off, driven wide of cover for a couple. Just out of reach of Baz
bad delivery. Short down leg, pulled down to fine leg for one. Lucky to get away with that

and gets a wicket with his first ball. Full and straight from Narine, Shafiq gets low, looks to paddle the ball down to fine leg. Fails to make any connection and the stumps light up. A struggling innings ends
poor ball, gets away with it. Short and wide from Narine, cut away but straight to backward point
Rossouw shapes for a switch hit. Narine fires this way down leg. Rossouw never left . Wide
shortish outside off, pushed away to cover
on the pads this time, length down leg, Rossouw misses a flick. Hit on the pad
a tad full this time, drilled down to long-off

huge wicket this. Sarfraz goes. Slow delivery outside off, it's short too. Sarfraz sees the length and decides to cut. The offbreak rips in, takes the inside edge and then clatters into the stumps. Poor shot selection. Excellent captaincy from McCullum to have Narine bowl one here.
Rossouw runs down and heaves one to deep midwicket. Not great timing
well bowled. Pushed wide outside off, Nawaz leaves.
on the pads, flicked down to short fine leg
nice. Slower through the air, straight, pushed back
runs down, Yasir fires the ball outside off, inside-edged into the pad
short again, wide. Hammered to cover. Another dot. Just two of the over. Good stuff.

out? Direct hit and that should be No.5. On a length outside off, carved to point. The fielder picks up cleanly and throws the stumps down at the bowler's end. Fantastic fielding. Elliott got in front of the stumps, but let the ball hit the stumps. The Qalandars have been on point today
slower ball outside off, mis-timed back to the bowler
driven away to deep cover for one
another offcutter outside off, so slow. Inside-edged towards midwicket. Pace off ruling the contest
well bowled. Pace off again, the ball stops on Rossouw, a checked drive makes its way to midwicket. So slow this surface
overpitched outside off, driven to cover. Another tidy over ticks by
short and wide, crashed out to deep point
slow outside off, worked to deep midwicket nicely, just one though
darted in on off, the offbreak, defended
shortish and a tad too wide, drilled out to deep cover for one
a reverse lap to short third man for a run
pushed down to long-off. End of a fantastic spell of T20 bowling. 4-0-16-2
a low full toss, hit down to long-off for one
that's a nice stroke. Too much width from Elliott. Rossouw gets low and hammers a lofted drive over cover. Superb timing
a bouncer. Short delivery on off and middle, Rossouw feigned a lap sweep, then executed an upper cut over third man for some runs
hit to the deep extra cover fielder for one
four more. Getting a move along now. Length outside off, hammered past cover and that will be four
punched to long-off for one. A good over that, 15 runs from it
fired in on middle, pushed to long-on. 'Keeper's end,' yells Rizwan. The second isn't attempted
shortish delivery on middle, scythed away to deep point
fired waaay down leg, wide

taken. Bhatti takes the catch at long-off, a nonchalant attempt but doesn't matter if you take them. Yasir tossed that googly up, inviting a heave. Thisara can't stop himself, skews the ball off the outside half and an easy catch is accepted
flat delivery outside off, tapped to short third man
nicely driven to long-off with the spin
uh oh. Naughty fielding. Flat outside off, Rossouw gets a thick outside edge which races down past short third man. Irfan can't get his hand down the ball, concedes a couple extra runs
a length delivery on off, played down to third man for one
on a length outside off, dabbed down to third man
another neat dab down to third man for a run
runs down and gets the ball past mid-off. Knew which area he wanted to attack and executed well. Hammered a slower delivery past mid-off
four more! Advances down and inside-edges his heave past the stumps for four. Fortuitous, but Gladiators will not care
slower ball on off, pushed down to mid-on
sees Rossouw coming, fires this on middle, pushed to long-on
good single, pushed to McCullum at cover and Rossouw sets off. Should not have been one there
flat on middle, a mis-timed reverse sweep to short third man
better from McCullum. Flat delivery outside off, hit to cover. No run
comes down and gets enough on his drive to clear the fielder. Not quite to the pitch but he had enough to get the ball over the fielder at long-on. Nice clean stroke
four more. Short and wide this time, scythed to deep point for four
huge! Short delivery on middle, Rossouw hammers his pull and it clears the fielder at midwicket. Fantastic batting
hit nicely past cover for a couple more. Fifty for Rossouw. Fantastic rearguard effort this
overpitched outside off, mis-timed to long-off. Just the one this time
lovely batting. A yorker on off, opens the face late to get that in front of point. Just one
full and straight, Rossouw can't quire get underneath that. One to long-on
good finish. A yorker on off, hit towards cover. Dot. Good over for Quetta
well bowled. A slow bouncer outside off. Rossouw tries to cut over point but doesn't make contact
excellent delivery. Yorker outside off, jammed away towards McCullum at cover.
full and straight, mis-timed to long-on for one.
a slower ball on middle, Rossouw mis-times his heave to deep midwicket. Lovely change in pace
slower ball on middle again. Hasan climbed into his mow, but doesn't get enough on that. Timing is hard on this surface, Hasan picks out deep midwicket. Superb over this so far
excellent over that. Just four off it. Slower ball outside off, jammed away to long-off for a run.
how did he get that there? Looks for a lap sweep over short fine leg, gets the ball over the keeper for a couple.
swiped away through midwicket. Full and straight from Irfan. The fielder at long-on dives to his left and saves a couple. Good effort

taken at long-on. End of an excellent innings that from Rossouw. Full on middle and off, right in the arc. Rossouw gets underneath it nicely, but gets more elevation than distance. Umar Akmal takes a well-judged catch at long-on
nice stuff. Full and straight, hammered to long-off for a couple. The fielder dives to his right to save a couple more
a yorker on off, squirted away to deep midwicket, just one more
a yorker on leg, Mills misses his slog and is struck right in front of leg stump. Given. Replays show the ball was missing leg stump.
nice start, flat outside off, played towards point
out goes the reverse sweep. Roy gets low and gets the ball to clear short third man. Clears the fielder comfortably
that's the first six. Roy runs down to the pitch, gets there and just lofts the ball over mid-on. Easy as ...
flat on middle, blocked this time
strays down leg this time, played away towards short fine leg
stops in the surface. Flat delivery on middle and leg, Roy pops the ball back
good length outside off, tapped towards third man with an angled bat
guided away, just past slip. Good length outside off from over the wicket, the ball moving away. Roy carves the ball past slip for four
another boundary. Good length on middle, Roy pulls, doesn't keep it down. Sits up for Roy to hammer through midwicket

whoa. Terrible communication from Roy. Good length on middle and leg, worked to square leg. Roy calls for one, realises there is no run, and sends McCullum back. Anwar Ali misses at the bowler's end. Hung him out to dry there did Roy.
on a length outside off, defended
very slow, short. Roy slaps the ball in front of cover for four. Just too easy. Poor bowling that
just a tad short and McCullum is all over it. Pulls to deep square leg, picks out the sole man there
another boundary. Flat on off, Roy gets down and clears the fielder at short third man. Sweep ball-striking. One of his easier shots
flat on off, drilled to long-off
four more. McCullum runs down and swipes the ball over midwicket, on the bounce and over.
slightly short on middle and leg, pulled to deep square leg for a run
bowled this time. Flat delivery on leg stump, Roy gets low, looks to paddle, but misses. The ball clips leg stump and the Gladiators have their first
hammered away for four more. On a length on middle, McCullum waits for the ball to come to him and then crashes a pull over midwicket
that's the slower ball. McCullum runs down but is flummoxed by the change in pace. Rolls through to the keeper
on a length on off, carved away towards third man
worked down to fine leg
a slower ball on off, McCullum let that come to him before carving one down to third man
well bowled. Puts extra oomph in this, gets the ball to slide through to the keeper. Beaten for pace
six! Full from Babar on leg, McCullum clears his front leg and shovels this way over long-on. Makes it look easy
slow down leg, pushed into the leg side for one
comes down, looks for a big hit but the length is dragged back, pushed away towards cover
picks out mid-on. Flat and full from Babar, McCullum wants to go over mid-on but fails to get under it sufficiently Straight to the fielder
a tad early into his drive, almost finds cover.
flat on middle, pushed back
slower ball on middle, worked away towards midwicket
on a length outside off, pushed towards cover

straight to mid-off. After blocking two deliveries, Akmal chips his wicket away looking for a big stroke. Just not good batting. Comes down the pitch, looking to go over the fielder at mid-off but picks him out perfectly.
on a length outside off, carved away past point for a couple. Nicely played, let that come to him
on a length outside off, carved down to third man
up and over point. On a length outside off, Zaman gets underneath the length and sends the ball over point. Nicely controlled
Rizwan comes down and defends. At least the intent to score is there
leading edge just past cover. On a length on middle, a thick outside edge to long-off
good single. Tip and run to point. Gets back and just pats this towards point
beauty. Full delivery outside off, the ball beats the bat. Plenty of turn. Superb length, drew Rizwan forward
what happened there? The umpire walks towards his partner to have a chat. Has it carried? Shehzad doesn't think he's taken it. A thick outside edge just lands in front of first slip. Lovely flight
flat outside off, pushed to long-off

big appeal and given. Pad first, then bat. Flat delivery on middle, Rizwan plants his front foot forward, puts his pad in line with the ball. The slider goes on, hits the pad, then bat. Sir Viv Richards goes wild on the bench. Well bowled
flat and straight, blocked
shortish delivery outside off, carved out to deep point
dropped? Flat delivery outside off, Zaman deflects the ball into the keeper's leg. Not really a drop. Saved some runs actually
a nice paddle down towards fine leg for a couple
flat on middle, played back. Another tidy over
Elliott runs down and drives to long-off for one, with the spin
slow through the air, patted away towards point. No run
comes down, the ball spins a touch and hits the batsman on the pad, misses his flick
slow through the air, Zaman flat-bats his swipe to long-on on the bounce
slow through the air, driven to cover
flat delivery outside off, hit away to deep cover for a run
Elliott comes down, Babar bowls that slightly wide, played away towards cover
defended into the off side
slow on the pads, played away towards midwicket
slow through the air on middle, outside-halved towards third man
worked away to short fine leg for a quick single. Has he made his ground through? Sarfraz thinks he has his man. he does. Wonderful fielding, quick release, on the full to the keeper.
chipped back, almost to the bowler. Slow through the air, short. Tanvir is too early through his stroke
flat delivery on middle, Elliott goes back and punches to long-off
pushed back towards the bowler
fired in on leg, worked away to deep square leg for a run
beauty. Flat delivery on middle, the ball grips and turns. Elliott is squared up, gets a leading edge towards cover
pushed away to long-on
pushed away to long-on with the spin. Another tidy over ticks by
on the pads, worked away to deep square leg

dropped! Oh my. Ahmed Shehzad. That should have been gobbled up. A length delivery on middle,m Elliott mis-times his drive, the ball goes straight to long-on. Shehzad runs in and lets the ball through
another slower ball, worked away to deep midwicket
slower yorker outside off, jammed out
worked away through midwicket
full and straight, played away to long-off awkwardly. Good over from Perera
bowled around his legs. Flat delivery on middle and leg, Tanvir looks to execute a fine paddle sweep. He has to connect, he doesn't. The stumps light up as the ball makes contact
tossed up down leg, Narine slogs down to fine leg
slow through the air, straight, defended
comes down the track, driven to long-on
flat down leg, clipped away to square leg, another single
pushed away past cover, a couple more as long-off cleans up
just clears short third man. A slow, straight delivery. Narine's swipe across the line results in a top edge that just evades the fielder at short third
another slower delivery, straight. Narine misses his slog again. Did that pitch outside leg? Yes says the umpire
a thick outside edge and it races away past short third man. Pace off the ball. Lucky for Elliott
another one. What are the odds? Slower delivery outside off, Elliott looks for the same stroke, to go over cover, the ball takes the outside edge and evades a diving Sarfraz to his right
off the middle this time, but one to long-off
slower ball outside off, trickles away to the keeper. No pace at all
some pace there. A quick bouncer on leg, Elliott lets this one go
a bouncer on leg, pulled to deep midwicket
another slower delivery. Narine has no idea which direction that is going in. Beaten by a considerable distance
a top edge and it lands safely. Short outside off, Narine wanted to hit that over point. Not proper connection. A couple to third man
a wild swing, completely beaten, excellent slower delivery
another bouncer on off, wide given. Over the head. Sarfraz was not happy
the extra ball goes a long way. Slower ball on leg, Narine clears his front leg and slogs the ball way over long-on. Handy blow
driven up to long-off for a run
slogged away for six. A decisive blow. Slower delivery down leg, Narine slogs. Anwar is patrolling the midwicket boundary, gets back and just parries the ball over
driven upto long-off
slower ball outside off, pushed long-off
a slower ball on middle and leg, driven to long-on. Just one
slower ball o off, swiped to deep square leg for one
tossed up on leg, driven to long-on. That's all the Qalandars need
a wild swing, off the pad and away towards fine leg
slow down leg, Elliott misses his sweep, struck on the pad. Missing leg
bowled. Big wicket. Flat delivery and straight, not very pacey. Gets the ball to stop a touch, beats the bat and hits middle stump. Undone by the pace of the surface. Beautifully bowled
driven to long-off with the spin
fired outside off, Narine doesn't care, clears his front leg and heaves the ball way over long-on. Six more. What an innings he has played
full and wide, inside the tramline. Bhatti misses his drive

how is that? A direct hit at the bowler's end. it's either a wicket or two runs. A length delivery from Mills, tapped to cover. The fielder picks up, turns around and effects a direct hit at the bowler's end. Bhatti is short by a few inches. Fantastic fielding. How crucial will that be?

gone! Quetta have the wicket they need. What bowling from Mills. Doesn't bother with the slower delivery, goes full and straight. Just a touch short than a full length. Narine is rooted in the crease and the ball pins him right in front. On this surface, bounce is hardly going to be a factor. Given.
just wide of slip. Full outside off, a thick outside edge. Splendid captaincy from Sarfraz, he has third man so fine for the No. 11
good length outside off, blocked to cover
uh oh. Full and wide, Yasir looks to go over mid-off. No contact. Suddenly, run rate is a factor too
short on off, pulled to long-on
shouldn't be a run there. Worked down to short fine leg for a quick single. Is there a direct hit? Irfan took his time to get across but got there eventually
driven decently to long-off. Another single.

straight up and Hasan takes a juggled catch. The Quetta Gladiators complete a stunning turnaround victory. A touch short from Hasan, yasir goes back and looks to pull but gets a thick leading edge, goes straight up and Hasan settles underneath it.
